subject: Climate & Environment
title: Solar Farms vs. Rooftop Solar
description: Learn Solar Farms vs. Rooftop Solar in one minute.

hook.text: A utility-scale solar farm can power 100,000 homes. A rooftop system powers just one.

buildup.text: Solar farms use cheap land in sunny deserts and benefit from massive economies of scale.

discovery.text: Rooftop solar skips transmission losses and lets homeowners generate their own power.

twist.text: Both compete for investment. Farms win on cost. Rooftops win on independence.

climax.text: The best strategy is both â€” large farms for baseload, rooftops for distributed resilience.

punchline.text: Big or small, every panel steals a watt from fossil fuels.
